programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: ROYAL-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is all a flutter his little tea shop is going to host a very special guest- the namboodhiri (the local cheiftain)and his adamant and pampered daughter to the teashop. Basha turns up and his acrobatics impress the little daughter and she insists that he sit with her.Sundar is appalled as Basha milks this development to the fullest and bosses Sundar around as if indeed he were a royal pet. Sundars attempts to oust Basha end in tea slopping over the prince or fruits splooshing on his daughters hairdo. Chai Raja immediately forbids Sundar from any more mischief. Sundar tries to ignore Basha but Basha makes things worse by setting up Sundar and making Chai Raja even angrier. The worst comes when Chai Raja is to be bestowed an honour by the prince and Basha causes Sundar to crash into the trophy busting it up. Chai Raja loses it and Sundar gets triple chores....but there is a smile on his face. For the daughter turns out to be a stubborn brat who insists that the monkey (Basha) be her pet and Basha is dragged away, fists banging as he is smothered with suffocating kisses by the daughter.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Grab a Crab
programme.desc: Once the crab is running from the eagle and enters in the GrandPAs courtyard where Keet helps him hide and they become good friends.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: Zoonicorns in the Zooniverse
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The Tortoise and the Hare
programme.desc: The Hare, the fastest animal in the woods, and the tortoise, the slowest, compete in a race.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: A Bumpy Trek
programme.desc: Don and Colonel went up the hill, to feast a platter, Colonel fell down and broke his bones and Don came tumbling after. Rocky terrain of the magic mountain and a sleepy Don is indeed a disastrous combination. So what you think awaits the team on the peak of this mountain?

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: TIMBER!!
programme.desc: There is unusual rush at the tea shop as customers seem to be pouring in. Chai Raja efficiently whips up teas but they are running short of chairs. Sundar runs pillar to post to seat the customers, even though Basha is trying his best to trip him up. Sundar then has an unusual brainwave- sure that he will impress his boss, Sundar throws open the closet and pulls out some chairs that had been stacked in a while ago. Proudly he sets them up and looks over to Chai Raja for a pat on the back- but then termites march out from under the old chairs...up and down the shop, chewing the tables/chairs...Sundar runs to keep them from crashing but Basha is all for helping the termites out. He glibly channels them this way and that and Chai Raja gawks as his customers who sit on chairs end up squatting on sawdust. Chai Raja discovers that its Sundars brainwave thats responsible for this wave of pests! Its crunch time for the termites and Sundar...and he better hurry else Chai Raja will be left with handle-less pans and a pile of dust instead of furniture!

programme.title: Breaking Chai
programme.desc: A holy man with quite a fan following claiming to possess magical telepathic powers turns up outside the shop. Chai Raja is more than accommodating- after all its extra business right at the doorstep and Basha is curious as the flexible Baba flaunts some acrobatic twists that Basha finds interesting. Sundar, on the other hand is too lazy and not enthusiastic about the extra crowd. The Baba is pompous and demanding- he bosses Chai Raja about . Chai Raja sees the crowding eager fans and the extra money and accommodates the demands. But Sundar is irritated by the Babas attitude and would love to get rid of him. Basha on the flipside is won over by the Baba who magically pulls out special bananas for Basha- Basha instantly teams up with the Baba. Sundar annoyed further at this partnership clumsily intervenes and instead he ends up exposing the Baba who was actually an imposter all along. Though the show is ruined, Chai Raja still grins as his shop has suddenly gone all popular and people are streaming in to see the dog that dunnit and Sundar for once, though still a server, beams as he dishes out paw-shaped fritters- his way of giving an autograph.

programme.title: Blackberry Tea
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Let Go - Jomi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: How To Ride A Bike
programme.desc: Colonel has gifted Don a brand new bike. But Don cant ride even to save his life! Colonel trains him but in vain! He bumps into other cars, stalls, crops until he finally bumps into Ballu!

programme.title: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Glass Tower
programme.desc: Buzz tells the others of a candy trapped deep in the basement of the library.he Creepy Candy embark on a dangerous journey and discover Bubbles, a pack of gum, stuck in a glass tower.Can they survive the perils awaiting them and find a way to save Bubbles? Tune in to find out!

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: RAIN IN KELIFORNIA
programme.desc: It is monsoon time and the teashop is leaking at various places. The customers are irritated with rain drops trickling on their head, clothes and even into their tea tumblers. And they start leaving the shop. A tensed Chai Raja orders Sundar to put a sheet over the roof. Sundar obediently and effectively does it and comes back. But Basha seizes the opportunity and wants to have some fun. It is leak marathon in the teashop with a group of suffering customers, angry Chai Raja and a panic stricken Sundar. At last when the entire roof flies off and it is literally monsoon inside the teashop, Basha stylishly comes outside the shop holding a giant umbrella. And all the customers run under it and have their steaming teas and snacks. An angry Chai Raja whacks Sundar and ask him to learn something from the smart Basha!

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Gold Ax and Silver Ax
programme.desc: Hardworking woodsman GoGo loses his only Ax in the pond. GoGos cry for help summons the Mountain Spirit, who rewards for his honesty. Another greedy woodsman UGo hears the story, and heads to the pond himself.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Chill out!
programme.desc: The twins find themselves in the gaming world where an irascible frog is very angry: no wonder nobody ever wants to play with him, unless...

programme.title: Palooza
programme.desc: The Twins help an old tortoise deal with a loud party that’s been keeping him awake.

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Hokus croakus!
programme.desc: The twins make peace between a witch and a young girl whos been messing with her book of spells.

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: The Controllator
programme.desc: Everyone has forgotten April’s birthday, so when a stranger gives her a present, she’s delighted to accept it. It’s one of Negu’s inventions, which makes her do things against her will. When April, controlled by Negu, manages to steal the Glove of the North, Pai and Xia prove that they had remembered her birthday really, and get April to remove the device that’s control her.

programme.title: APPLECART UPSET
programme.desc: The Fruit Ninjas, Mark Samurai, Durian grey and Sensei meet at DFS burger for a final showdown

programme.title: Old Jeans
programme.desc: Wondering what to do with that old pair? Hepi and Briko have an excellent idea

programme.title: The Secret of the Fort
programme.desc: An old fort in the water is a great place for a small outing in history and Dunky is all curious to do just that. So Keet and Cat also tag along in the fort.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: You're All Useless!
programme.desc: Negu is sick and tired of Amkko, Koto and Mei’s uselessness and kicks them out. The Guardians try to teach them to behave properly so they can fit in in the Yan World, but the Mutants are the worst students ever. Negu sends them a message saying that if they snatch the Glove of the North, he’ll take them back, so Mei tricks the Guardians into taking them to the Magic Fort and tries to steal the glove. Everyone is relieved that the Mutants are back to normal.

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: Lamps And Fireworks
programme.desc: Its busy time at home with Diwali evening party , with lots of sweets , fire works and lamps.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: The Lost Lagoon
programme.desc: After spilling juice on mom’s blanket and not fessing up, Odessa feels guilty. In the Zooniverse, she offers to lead her friends to a lagoon to watch a butterfly dance but doesnt speak up when she loses the map. Never give up, try your hardest, and always tell the truth!

programme.title: Paper Cups
programme.desc: What could our DIY make with a paper cup? Lets find out

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: The Fastest Porter in the Land
programme.desc: Aladdins in big trouble when he forgets to deliver the egg traders eggs to market. Luckily Jamillah brings him a bike. After teaching him how to ride, they head off to deliver the eggs only for them to break them along the way. They eventually have to ask Genie to help by conjuring some eggs. After a few failed attempts it seems he manages it but we discover Genies magic eggs have a surprise inside that delights the customers.

programme.title: The Macaroni Plant
programme.desc: Gummy is determined to grow his favourite food – even if macaroni plants don’t exist!

programme.title: Die Laughing - The Emperor’s New Clothes
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Emperor’s New Clothes”, having been called out by the father of HANS, a 5-year-old boy. HANS has gone missing during the parade in which the EMPEROR wore his new clothes for the first time in public. SANDRA discovers that HANS is, in fact, the little boy who laughs when he sees the EMPEROR in his underwear, thus revealing the obvious truth that no one dared mention: the Emperor has no clothes on. The detective will also discover that Rufus, the Emperor’s bitter, resentful jester, is behind the disappearance of HANS.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Scolymus – The Sorcerer’s Apprentice
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the SORCERER’S APPRENTICE, having been called out by the old sorcerer and mentor in the story. When he returned from his journey, he found his tower full of water, as in the classic tale. But, unlike the story, his APPRENTICE had also mysteriously disappeared. SANDRA will discover that the APPRENTICE has been kidnapped by SCOLYMUS, a sinister spirit invoked by the apprentice to do his work for him.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Invincible Dragon - Saitn George’s Legend
programme.desc: SANDRA visits her UNCLE TONY at the old funfair where he works and is shocked to hear that it is about to shut down, because of falling visitor numbers. When she is on the ghost train, she is visited by her assistant FO, who has come to get her for a new case in the “Land of Fairytales”. On this occasion, SANDRA and FO travel into the legend of “Saint George and the Dragon”, where they face a very singular DRAGON.

programme.title: Mewmew’s Hiccups
programme.desc: Mewmew is out exploring with a spring in his step and song in his mouth. Deedee and Nino are surprised to hear him sing and sets up a proposition for Mewmew to sing at the concert hall with Tiggy’s lemonade stand nearby. The concert is all set and so is Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Mewmew is parched with practising so long and is totally refreshed with Tiggy’s minty lemonade, but it turns out he’s got the hiccups. All the conjured tactics to beat the hiccups, including Tiggy’s super sour lemon lime sherbet fizzerade doesn’t seem to work. Only magic seems to stop this stubborn bout of hiccups in time for the concert. The spell works on Mewmew but backfires and the bubblecordion gets a fit of hiccups. Mewmew is so sad, but it turns out that the townsfolk are mesmerized by the bubbles. Alas, the bubbles are about to tip over Tiggy’s lemonade stand. Suddenly the blaring horns of Tika Pila gives everybody a shock of surprise, even the bubblecordion that the hiccups come to a halt. Now that the lemonade stand is safe, lemonade is served all around. Mewmew is all set for the concert, which surprisingly ends with a sneeze.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Crosswalk Harry
programme.desc: Harry gets a job as a crosswalk guard and winds up taking his duties VERY seriously, to the point of nearly driving Gummy crazy when he wants to just cross the street.

programme.title: It's Santa Claus!
programme.desc: Its a hot summer day, but Duda is reading a book about Santa Claus. Discovering that Santa Claus only gives gifts to children who do good deeds, Duda jumps at every opportunity he gets to help his friends. Later that day, Duda meets up with Pelly. Pelly is upset because she lost all her packages because of a hole in her coat. After seeing Pellys packages and his red jacket, Duda assumes he is Santa Claus. So he volunteers to help Pelly find the rest of his "gifts." He tells all his friends that Santa Claus has shown up, and they all join in looking for packages. They manage to find all the missing packages and bring them to Pelly. Duda excitedly asks Santa "Pelly" for a gift... however, Pelly has some disappointing news.

programme.title: THE LILY OF THE EAST:
programme.desc: The Guardians take a welcome break from brainteasers to go fetch pollen from the Lily of the East, which only grows in one faraway cave. Everyone (including Negu) is convinced the flower’s pollen bestows magical powers. After an arduous journey through a bamboo forest and a series of caves, the Guardians reach the lily. But Koto and Amkko (who have been following in disguise) snatch the flower! By distracting the two mutants with riddles, the Guardians regain the precious flower and its pollen, which the Elders wanted…to flavor their tea!

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Disapprearing Act
programme.desc: In the waking world, Odessa gets embarrassed, which makes her invisible in the Zooniverse. With the humorous help of the Zoonicorns she gains understanding and perspective – and becomes visible again! When you make the effort to understand your feelings, you can manage them and move forward from them in a positive way.

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: Casa en venta
programme.desc: La familia visita por última vez su vieja cabaña antes de venderla, cuando de repente el abuelo desaparece.

programme.title: A un paso del paraíso
programme.desc: La familia Potapov ha ganado el premio mayor de la lotería, pero nunca había sido tan infeliz como ahora.

programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol 1951
programme.desc: In A Christmas Carol, Alastair Sim delivers a definitive performance as Ebenezer Scrooge, the miser whose icy heart is thawed by a haunting Christmas Eve journey. Visited by the ghost of Jacob Marley and the three Spirits of Christmas, Scrooge is forced to confront his past, witness the struggles of the present, and glimpse the bleak future awaiting him if he does not change. With atmospheric direction, powerful performances, and a timeless message of redemption, this beloved adaptation brings Charles Dickens’ classic tale to life in unforgettable fashion.

programme.title: The Star of Bethlehem 1956
programme.desc: In The Star of Bethlehem, the timeless Nativity story is brought to life in a reverent and beautifully crafted short film. Through vivid visuals and heartfelt narration, the journey of Mary and Joseph, the shepherds in the fields, and the guiding star that led the Wise Men to Bethlehem are retold with warmth and devotion. With its simple yet powerful storytelling, this classic reminds audiences of the wonder, hope, and faith at the heart of Christmas.

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose 1957
programme.desc: In The Adventures of Robin Hood: The Christmas Goose, Richard Greene dons the green cloak once more in this holiday-themed tale of merriment and mischief. When greedy lords try to tax the people of Sherwood into hunger during the Christmas season, Robin Hood and his Merry Men hatch a clever plan involving a prize goose to bring cheer back to the poor. With daring adventure, festive spirit, and a touch of Yuletide humor, this family-friendly special blends classic Robin Hood heroics with holiday warmth.

programme.title: Santa Claus vs The Devil 1959
programme.desc: In Santa Claus vs. The Devil, Christmas magic collides with mischief in a one-of-a-kind holiday fantasy. As Santa prepares for his yearly journey, the Devil sends his wicked helper Pitch to tempt children and ruin the season of giving. From a workshop in the clouds to fiery battles of good versus evil, Santa must outwit the forces of darkness to deliver joy across the world. Whimsical, bizarre, and unforgettable, this cult classic proves that not even the Devil himself can steal Christmas.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join Dominic Depinto on a tour of Grand Cathedral Cigar Lounge in Tampa Florida. Learn the history and check out their walk in humidor, only on Unrolled.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss is joined by Dr. Anthony Grant, owner of The Cigar Quarters, to review the Perdomo Lot cigar. Together, they explore its bold flavors, construction, and overall smoking experience, giving their expert takes on this standout stick.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: Sean crosses the pond to sit down with Shaun Wilkinson, the driving force behind the British cigar brand, Rebellion. Shaun pulls back the curtain on the unique challenges and triumphs of establishing a premium cigar company in the UK, the inspiration behind Rebellion's distinctive blends, and their vision for the future of British cigars. Tune in for an engaging conversation that explores a fascinating corner of the global cigar landscape.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Join seasoned tobacco authorities Brian and Chris as they put the highly anticipated Cohiba Riviera under the microscope. Expect a detailed breakdown of its construction, flavor profile, and overall smoking experience. Will the Riviera live up to the Cohiba name? Find out as Brian and Chris deliver their expert assessment on this premium cigar.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: In this episode, Stephen and I enjoy cigars or pipes, drinks, and share some cigar news. We‚Äôll also feature a Cigar Word from Micallef and a Cigar Tip from Erez cigars. Dave Yancey joins us for a pairing of Lovely Cigars from Green Bay, WI with Michters Small Batch American whiskey. Plus, a Shop Stop at Mi Casa Cigars and Lounge near Tampa, FL.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: I love many genres of movies! In this episode, Ian and I will be talking about some of our favorite movies that have cigar smoking in them. There are great movies and then there are great movies that have one of the main characters enjoying a cigar.

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: On this episode Ian and I welcome DJ from Pick Jimi cigar reviews. He is a transplanted Texas BOTL that has a unique and fun cigar review channel on YouTube. He was another channel that gave Texas Cigar Roadshow a shout out with being in his top 10 channels to watch, so of course we had to pay our respects and have him on a Pit Stop!

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ELIAS DOSUNMU - EL CHEF UCRANIANO MÁS VIRAL
programme.desc:
En este súper episodio conocemos un poco más acerca de Elias Dosunmu, inmigrante ucraniano y chef del momento. Con más de 15 millones en sus redes sociales nos cuenta cómo fueron sus comienzos y cómo se prepara para la próxima apertura de su propio restaurante en Madrid: PECADOS.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MERAKIO - EL QUE SE RÍE PIERDE
programme.desc:
En este episodio vino el creador de contenido Merakio a contarnos cómo es vivir de las redes sociales, qué es lo que más le preocupa y qué planes tiene para su futuro. Capítulo con muchas risas aseguradas. No olvides suscribirte!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: LUANA FIGUEREDO - LA FIGURA EMERGENTE DE LA ESCENA ARGENTINA
programme.desc:
Conocimos a la artista argentina Luana Figueredo, conversamos sobre su carrera, su futuro y además nos deleitó con su voz. Estamos seguros de que su talento la llevará a cruzar todas las fronteras.

programme.desc:

programme.title: Ed Young Ministries
programme.desc: When you're asleep, you don't know you're sleeping until you're awake — since we spend 1/3 of our lives sleeping, we have a lot of waking up to do! In this message, Pastor Ed Young teaches that ideas have consequences — deceptive or dire ideas have destructive effects. We learn that Wokeism is a bad idea, and we must wake up to its aftermath, which originates with the enemy himself. And we’ll discover that life fires on all cylinders when we wake up to knowing the Lord. Are you woke yet still in slumber, or genuinely awake?

programme.title: Guest Hakim Green
programme.desc: Hakim Green was part of Channel Live a hot 90s Rap duo known for the massive hit “Mad-Izm.” The success of that record changed Green’s life in many ways—because he known for talking about weed, people started asking him for it. So he started selling it. But the struggle to make another massive hit led to depression, failure, and homelessness. It’s an incredible life story.

programme.title: Guest Raquel Willis
programme.desc: Raquel Willis is a major trans activist and the author of a powerful memoir called The Risk It Takes To Bloom. We dive deep into what it means to be trans from her coming out to her politics to her dating life. Amazing conversation.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guest Chef Charlie Mitchell
programme.desc: Chef Charlie Mitchell was the first Black chef in New York City to earn a Michelin star. He got it for his acclaimed Brooklyn restaurant Clover Hill. Mitchell is a brilliant chef and this convo dives deep into the mind of a great chef.

programme.title: The Human Experiment
programme.desc: A riveting documentary about chemicals being poured into our lives in various ways.

programme.title: Ending Real Fur
programme.desc: Playboy jewelry mogul turns anti-fur investigator. Also features fashion legend Tim Gunn.

programme.title: Weight Loss Top Secrets
programme.desc: Award-winning dietitian reveals the top 3 secrets to weight loss! 1st of a series. Let's take it off

programme.title: Wicked Kitchen's Street Style Tofu
programme.desc: Derek Sarno shows us how to make tofu into a sassy, hipster dish.

programme.title: Rich Roll: Plant-Strong, Ultra-Athlete
programme.desc: Rich Roll is a plant-based athlete &nutrition advocate with a compelling, inspirational story.

programme.title: S4E5 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S4E2 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S2E7 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S2E2 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Village of the Vampire
programme.desc: Rebecca is searching for her sister, a young journalist who went missing while investigating a series of unfortunate events. The trail leads her to Timere, a remote place far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, where amidst the tight lipped silence of the town's inhabitants there's an ever growing fear of dark forces at work and no-one dares to leave their home at night. Here Rebecca meets an extravagant writer, the church warden of the town and above all Caleb, a charming, rich and elegant man whose dark gaze hides a chilling secret. It's in this town, where time appears to move between the shadows and danger lurks around every corner that Rebecca learns of the terrible truth and the battle between good and evil begins...

programme.title: Clown Motel
programme.desc: Clown Motel follows a group of ghost hunters, coming from an old ghost town and a bachelorette party, returning home from Las Vegas. When the groups meet up, by mistake, they're left to discover if the motel is really abandoned and haunted by the souls, of the clowns, that once lived there...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: El Regreso del 24
programme.desc: Después de sobrevivir a una herida mortal, el 24 decide retirarse del negocio por un tiempo. Pero sus enemigos no descansaran hasta encontrarlo y para hacerlo aparecer matan a su hermana. Ahora la furia del 24 no tendrá limites .

programme.title: El Nuevo Narcotraficante
programme.desc: Octavio Beltrán lleva una vida rutinaria acompañada de pobreza. Una peripecia lo pone al margen de su credibilidad y honestidad, obligado y decidido a meterse en el bajo mundo del narcotráfico. Ya estando dentro, su objetivo es ser el mejor en lo que hace y no conformarse con sólo ser empleado. Desafiando al sultán; poderoso y mero chaca del negocio, su ahora exjefe y su nuevo peor enemigo. Desatando una lucha a muerte por el poder en donde hay cabida para la intriga, drama, acción y sobre todo para las sorpresas para estos personajes.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?

programme.title: El Desertor
programme.desc: Luego de ser reclutado para el servicio militar y ante los abusos de su jefe inmediato, el Subteniente Montilla, Julián escapa del cuartel, lo que provoca una feroz persecución por parte de Montilla, quien se ha enamorado de Sagrario y hará todo lo posible para separar a los jóvenes.

programme.title: El Tercer Deseo
programme.desc: Eugenio, un corredor de bienes raíces despierta en una esquina de la ciudad con una descomunal borrachera y descubre cerca una desportillada tetera de metal. La toma y manosea a ver si es de plata y, de pronto, se le aparece el espectro de un duende que le sugiere formule tres deseos. El genio desaparece sin dar oportunidad al tercer deseo. Mas tarde, descubre que los deseos le han sido concedidos pero de forma equivocada. La vida de Eugenio se complica, solo anhela reencontrar la tetera abandonada y pedir el tercer deseo.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: 48 Horas de Terror
programme.desc: Mateo un escritor citadino adquiere una casa de campo en donde planea vivir con su esposa y escribir en la tranquilidad del campo, pero no tomo en cuenta las trágicas noticias de los acontecimientos de canibalismo que ocurrieron a manos de sus vecinos quienes solo buscan sacias su hambre. Mateo y su esposa corren por sus vidas entre las desoladas montañas buscando sobrevivir al ataque de estos caníbales al final sobrevivirá el más fuerte

programme.title: The Juniors y La Formula Imperial
programme.desc: Narra las vidas de 7 adolescentes millonarios que se aventuran a planificar una revolución social, generada por vídeo-escándalos y experimentos médicos, con el objetivo de generar un cambio en la ideología mundial, el conflicto entre las clases sociales y el enfrentamiento con sus muchachas de servicio doméstico.

programme.title: The God Of After
programme.desc: It’s time to get ready. In “The God Of After,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that the attack you’re facing is proof of the purpose on your life.

programme.title: Don't Tap Out Tap In
programme.desc: What are you really fighting? In “Don’t Tap Out Tap In,” Pastor Steven Furtick reveals that God is waging war with what’s coming against you — because the fruit is coming!

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Making Peace With Missing Pieces
programme.desc: In “Making Peace With Missing Pieces,” we learn that even the things we feel are “missing” can serve a purpose in our lives.

programme.title: Is There Anything I Can Do For You?
programme.desc: When you know God has been faithful to you, you can’t help but want to offer everything you have back to Him. Pastor Chad Veach encourages us to embrace humility and discover how God wants to use us in “Is There Anything I Can Do For You?”
